# Synchro LOS Analysis (Existing) {#sec-apdx-synchro-ex}

This appendix contains the results of the Synchro \acr{LOS} analysis for the existing road volumes, signal timings, and lane configurations. The analysis of the \acr{AWSC} 1200 South / Towne Centre Blvd intersection is given first, followed by the analysis for the remaining (signalized) intersections.
